title: Implementing Voice Control with Whisper
description: Enabling robots to understand and respond to natural human speech is a significant step towards more intuitive and accessible human-robot interaction (HRI). Voice control allows users to command robots using natural language, freeing them from complex interfaces. OpenAI's Whisper is a state-of-the-art, open-source Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) system that excels at transcribing spoken language into text, even in challenging conditions.
